Author: yorktronic#2703
Content: does KMD (and thus PIRATE) have the same or similar RPC interface that ZEC does?

Author: yorktronic#2703
Content: I'd like to be able to get nethash and diff directly from the chain -- I currently maintain a database of chaindata for a ton of coins

Author: yorktronic#2703
Content: so I can do some analysis

Author: yorktronic#2703
Content: in particular I'm interested in modeling the pirate nethash against other equihash coins to see where some of the hashrate is coming from

Author: yorktronic#2703
Content: I think I can accomplish this by running a kmd node on linux and activating the PIRATE chain in the command line

Author: yorktronic#2703
Content: or use the command line thing in Agama, but i need to be able to dump to text file to get in to my postgres db

Author: yorktronic#2703
Content: anyway, any advice would be appreciated
